January: Happy January 1st! What has already gone wrong today, and what has gone right?
How was your first kiss?
What is a recent purchase you are excited about?
What do you think will be socially unacceptable in 10 years?
In what ways are you a good friend?
Would you appreciate a surprise party?
What do you think the world needs right now?
What are your thoughts about morning vs. evening showers? (Or... afternoon?)
What is one thing that happened recently, that you would like to remember in 10 years?
If you could live in any city for 2 years, which city would you pick?
What would you not buy for yourself, but would like to receive as a present?
What is a temptation you had to face recently?
What is something that bugs you?
What advice would you give to someone who is just starting at your job?
If you suddenly received £1000 and had to spend it within 30 minutes, how would you spend it? (Cannot be deposited nor invested in the stock market)
Do you prefer hosting or going over to someone else's house?
How is your personality different in front of family, friends, strangers, and/or coworkers?
What is something silly you believed to be true as a child?
What do you hope to achieve this year?
Do you prefer paperback or hardback books?
What are your immediate thoughts when you pass a homeless person?
I wish I didn't have to ...
If you could pick any view to see from your bedroom window, what would you pick? (e.g. a meadow with cows)
What has become way too expensive?
Is there a favourite content creator you recently started following? Why do you like their content?
Sum-up your day in one word, your week in one word, and your month in one word.
What is troubling you the most at this moment?
What class do you wish was taught in high school?
Who is a publicly unknown hero that you know, or have witnessed in action?
Is there a hygiene habit you struggle to keep up with?
What will you continue doing in February, and what will you leave behind in January?
February: What was the most interesting thing you saw or heard recently?
You run into a friend 3 years from now. When asked how you are doing, you say, “this has been the best 3 years of my life”. What happened in those 3 years?
What is better homemade, and what is better store-bought?
What was a difficult decision you had to make?
If you could choose not to sleep without any consequences of sleep deprivation, would you stay awake forever?
What is a skill or area of knowledge you would like to develop in the next year?
If given the chance, would you be a model? (fashion, runway, commercials)
What is something you wish you did when you were younger?
What subscription service or premium fee is 100% worth it to you?
Do you perform better when competing or collaborating?
What have you been procrastinating?
What is a “normal” life experience you feel like you missed out on?
Your friend is visiting! Make a 24 hour itinerary for your neighbourhood / city.
If you had to eat breakfast, lunch, and dinner at a single food chain for 2 weeks straight, which establishment would you pick?
Is there a part of your personality you try to suppress?
What is your favourite hour of the day?
Who do you spend time with the most? How would your life and personality be different without them?
Do you respond to texts right away? What are some texting habits you have?
What are some qualities you would tolerate in a friend, but not a partner?
What activity makes you lose track of time?
What is a struggle meal you actually like? (a struggle meal can be a cheap meal when finances are tight, or a low effort meal when you have no energy)
What do you look forward to doing when you are older?
What do you think about nepotism?
What is something you wish you could enjoy?
Do you have any rules surrounding food and eating?
Why would someone be lucky to have you in their life?
Should high schools teach functional life skills? (e.g. cooking, filing taxes, budgeting, etc.)
What will you continue doing in March, and what will you leave behind in February?
March: What is a realistic goal and an ideal goal you have for this month?
After a bad day, what would for sure turn it around?
Would you rather eat over-salted or under-salted food for the rest of your life? Sickeningly-sweet or nothing sweet ever again? A notch too spicy or no spicy food ever again?
What is something about being an adult that nobody prepared you for?
How do you decide when to video record an experience versus living in the moment?
Would teenage-you be proud of you today?
If you could hire someone to do a chore for you, what would the service be?
What is something you wish you appreciated more, before it was too late?
Do you prefer watching movies or TV shows?
What do you like and dislike about living alone?
What's the most difficult part about being you?
What do you think about as you are falling asleep?
I wish I had enough money to...
Would you rather only eat slightly under-ripe or slightly over-ripe produce for the rest of your life?
What are your genetic advantages and disadvantages?
How has your idea of being successful in life changed over the years?
What do you not get enough credit for?
Who is the most impactful person in your life right now?
What is a telltale sign that you are going through a tough time?
What do you think is unfair about your life?
What are some things on your wishlist?
What are you looking forward to right now?
What do you need to stop doing?
What would you do if time stopped for 1 day, for everyone but you?
What is something that you can do today that will benefit you tomorrow?
Do you think using emojis contribute to text conversations?
What is a hobby you have been wanting to try?
I have trouble sleeping when…
Do you care about leaving a legacy and people remembering who you are?
What is something good you can count on happening every day?
What will you continue doing in April, and what will you leave behind in March?
April: What are you planning to eat for lunch today?
What is a common friendship activity that does not appeal to you at all? (e.g. long road trip)
Do you feel younger than, older than, or right around your age?
If you could get a degree in anything without financial or job prospect pressures, what would you study?
What is a fashion trend you like and dislike?
When do you feel most lonely and when do you feel most socially connected?
What is an urge you resisted recently?
Do you think you’re a better person today than a year ago?
Are there any symbols of wealth that don’t appeal to you, even if you had the money for it? (e.g. luxury cars)
What can you do this year to make 2026-you proud?
What do you think about being high school sweethearts versus meeting a partner later in life?
What do you need most right now?
Is there a business that has earned your loyalty?
Is there a business you stopped buying from recently?
Imagine you are socializing in a room full of people you don’t know very well. What makes someone stand out to you?
What is something you were very worried about, but the situation ultimately never occurred?
When you see photos or videos of yourself from 5-10 years ago, what goes through your mind?
List out 3 things about yourself that serve as proof of you as a good or capable person.
What’s your favourite spot in your home?
How do you feel about getting older?
What is a wake-up call you had recently?
Is there someone you look up to, but would not want to trade places with them?
What is a habit you would like to adopt?
Have you ever ghosted someone?
Do you like ordering food delivery? (e.g. Skip, Door Dash, Uber Eats)
Is there a brief encounter or an insignificant remark that stuck with you?
What is a misconception many people have that drives you crazy?
What is something that you’ve been wanting to try?
Did you have a “blunder” phase in your life that still makes you cringe?
What will you continue doing in May, and what will you leave behind in April?
May: What was your most recent accomplishment, big or small?
If you had a spare room in your house, what would you turn it into?
What is currently your biggest source of stress?
How much time do you spend outside daily?
What is something you look forward to each day?
What is one thing you don’t like about your life that is outside of your control? One thing within your control?
Would you rather be bored or be too busy?
What is something you really want to do or experience again?
Outside of an academic setting, should spelling & grammar be corrected?
What is the difference between “living” and “feeling alive” to you?
What can you do today to make next week easier?
What is something you should buy the brand name version of?
What is something you prefer to buy the store brand or knock-off version of?
Do you want to live longer than the average expectancy?
What do you think about forums dedicated to snarking on celebrities and public figures?
What are 3 things you would like to be remembered as?
When do you feel the most patriotic? Alternatively, why don't you feel patriotic?
What are some signs that you are happy and well?
What is your favourite part about being you?
Rate 2025 so far out of 5 stars.
Can we feel happiness without sadness?
Where should you cut your spending a bit?
What has been worth the hype, and what has been overhyped?
What is your ideal meal after a burning hot day? Ideal meal after a freezing cold day?
What is a luxury you like to splurge on?
What do you think is the key to lasting romantic relationships?
Is there a class you have been wanting to take? (e.g. pottery)
What is your favourite thing to do in each season?
Do you think it’s worse to constantly dwell in the past, or constantly worry about the future?
What do you love about your generation? (Gen Z, Millennials, etc.)
What will you continue doing in June, and what will you leave behind in May?
June: What are some recent challenges you faced?
What has made you genuinely smile recently?
What is your favourite way of eating a potato? No sweet potato answers allowed.
Have you ever started liking someone who you previously disliked?
Are you satisfied with your social life?
If you could clone yourself, what would you have “you 2.0” do while you are going about your day?
What is something about you that you wish you could put on a resume?
Is there something you don’t think should be joked about?
What is a pet peeve that peeved you recently?
What is a foreign dish you would like to try?
What is a rabbit hole you went down recently?
Who makes you instantly happy?
Do you think everyone is beautiful?
What is a mistake you have made or a lesson you had to learn, multiple times?
What are 3 things you would save from a house fire, assuming all people, pets, documents, and important electronics are saved?
What have you been hypocritical about?
Would you rather explosively sneeze every time someone says “hi” to you, or every time someone says “thank you” to you?
At what point does reasonably raising your quality of life turn into lifestyle creep?
Have you ever been disappointed by a famous person, or someone you looked up to?
Who is the first person you tell when you have life-changing good news?
What is something you know you should care more about, but you simply don’t?
Are you happy living where you live?
If you could see a statistic about someone on their forehead by command, what statistic would you like to see?
Do you feel like your “popularity” or “success” in high school translated to adulthood?
If you had an extra 2 hours daily, how would you spend it?
If you lost 2 hours daily, how would you restructure your day?
What do you think you could have excelled at, if given the chance and resources when you were younger?
What word would you use to describe this phase of your life?
What do you wish you started doing sooner?
What do you want to bring into July, and what do you want to leave behind in June?
July: How do you want the next 6 months to be different from the previous 6?
What have you changed your mind on?
What is a recent purchase you are excited about?
Is there a colour you dislike? If so, why? (alternate: what do you like about your favourite colour?)
If you had to summarize your life story so far using 5 bullet points, what would these pivotal moments be?
What is something you thought was healthy, but later learned it wasn’t?
Do you think the world is a better place now compared to 5 years ago?
What is uncertain in your life right now?
Would you rather have an older brother, younger brother, older sister, younger sister, or identical twin?
Do you think ex-partners can successfully get back together after a break-up? (“success” in this case means staying together for the rest of one party’s life)
What worries you about the next 5 years?
What is something you want to remember about today? (If it's the morning: What is something you want to remember about yesterday?)
What do you feel lucky about?
If you had 3 days off from work, would you rather go to the beach, a busy city, the countryside, on a camping trip, or stay at home?
What are you looking forward to tomorrow?
Are you happy with your home?
Is there something being expected of you (by society, family) that you wish wasn’t?
Summarize your week using 5 emojis (yes, doodle them). Feel free to write a blurb as well.
What is your love language? (acts of service, quality time, words of affirmation, receiving gifts, physical touch)
Is there anything that is always at the back of your mind?
Do you post pictures of yourself on social media?
What makes someone confident but not arrogant?
Do you think you are a petty person?
Disregarding your birth month, which month is your favourite?
What makes you hopeful about the future?
What is something that drains your energy?
What is something you did growing up, that you don't see kids nowadays doing anymore?
What would you love to receive as a gift?
What is your go-to way of treating yourself?
What is typically the first thought when you wake up?
What do you want to bring into August, and what do you want to leave behind in July?
August: If you dated someone who was very similar to you, how long do you think the relationship would last, and if applicable, what would be the reason you break up?
Is there something you really wish could be resolved this month?
What do you wish your government would invest more in?
What foods do you prefer quantity over quality, and what foods do you prefer quality over quantity? (e.g. I prefer one scoop of good ice cream over several scoops of average ice cream)
What is something about adulthood you wish you were warned about?
What is your favourite carbohydrate, protein, & fat?
What habit of a roommate would be an immediate dealbreaker for you?
Do you think tax should be included in prices, or added at checkout?
What motivates you to keep going during difficult times?
What is your ideal morning routine, and what stops you from making it a reality?
If you could open a café, what would it be like? (e.g. What would you serve? What would you specialize in? Themes? Decor?)
What is a daily inconvenience you face?
What is something you have been wanting to purchase, related to a hobby?
Do you have a physical insecurity that you have come to love or accept over time?
Do you have a personality or character flaw that you don’t think you will be able to change?
In relationships, what sorts of differences could be beneficial, and what sorts of differences could be a challenge?
What is something you learned about yourself this year?
What is something you wish you could do without consequences?
When do you feel the most peaceful?
How can you be a little less wasteful?
In what period of your life have you been the healthiest both mentally and physically?
What is your ideal evening routine, and what stops you from making it a reality?
How have your clothing and fashion choices changed over the years?
Who is someone you admire for their talent or work, but dislike as a person?
What is your opinion about fast fashion?
What snacks would be part of your perfect sleepover with your best friend?
What does “world peace” look like in your mind?
What is a convenience you don’t mind paying for?
You just got a text and smiled as soon as you saw their name. Who is it?
Is there something you hope will happen by the end of this year?
What do you want to bring into September, and what do you want to leave behind in August?
September: If you could invent a holiday, when & what would it be? How would it be celebrated?
Suppose you are in a room with people you have not spoken to within the past year. Who are you looking for first?
What do you love about this time of year?
Currently, do you think you should be doing more or fewer things every day?
What is something free that you are grateful for?
If you were given the opportunity to write a book, what kind of book would it be?
What first impression do you want other people to have about you?
What is your favourite thing about your country?
Who is your biggest cheerleader?
What appetizer, main, dessert, and drink would be your perfect dinner out?
Is there a sincere apology from someone you wish you could get, but likely won’t?
Is there an emoji you don’t understand the use for? Is there an emoji you like but never had the situation to use it in?
What activities cause you to lose track of time?
Is there something you are jealous and/or envious about?
What is your favourite way to celebrate milestones or achievements?
Is there something you thought was a huge deal, but it didn’t end up being a big deal?
Is there a hobby you don’t enjoy anymore? Or, a hobby you don’t do anymore for some other reason?
Imagine your life in 10 years is similar to your current daily life. Would you be satisfied?
What is the hardest goodbye you had to say?
What is a small (or big) win you had this week?
What is something you wish you got to experience as a child?
If you could wish for something for someone else, what and for who would it be?
What unexpected places have you found beauty and inspiration?
What is the dominant emotion in your life right now?
Would you rather have a longer morning, afternoon, or evening?
Do you think it’s possible to be completely yourself around another person?
What is a piece of advice you often give to others, but don’t practice yourself?
Would you rather forever have a giant pimple on your forehead, or 20 minutes of hiccups once a day at random times?
What is a compliment you would like to receive?
What do you want to bring into October, and what do you want to leave behind in September?
October: You are leaving your current city forever. What will you miss most?
Is there anything you are avoiding right now?
What is a difficult truth you had to accept?
What makes a vacation a good one for you?
Do you feel mentally like your age?
Is there a meal you enjoy that probably doesn’t exist outside of your household?
What are some go-to things you do to help when you are feeling down?
What is a disclaimer you wish you could give to everyone you are about to meet?
Is there something you are really close to achieving?
What seasonal flavour do you genuinely like any time of the year? (e.g. pumpkin spice, gingerbread)
What is something you had to unlearn?
Do you prefer living in a more individualist society or a more collectivist society?
What excites you about this week?
What is something worth paying more for better quality?
“We tend to overestimate what we can do in a day and underestimate what we can do in a year.” How true is this for you?
What cuisines do you like to cook at home, get for takeout, and eat at a restaurant?
Imagine yourself 15 years older. What do you hope you don’t become?
What is a cheesy romantic gesture you would actually appreciate?
What is a realistic dream you have, and what is a far-fetched dream you have?
What is a “first world problem” you have right now?
Do you like standing out and being above average?
It's 11pm. You just got home after a long, stressful day. You have a £60 UberEats gift card. What are you ordering?
How do you ensure you don't get stuck just 'going through the motions' of life?
What stereotype about your country (or state, province, city) is true, and what stereotype is false?
What do you think about profanity (swear words)?
You wake up not feeling like you want to go to school, work, the gym, or attend some responsibility. How do you know when you should give yourself a break vs. enforce discipline?
Do you prefer having a large/close knit extended family, or a small/distant extended family?
What is something you didn't understand adults complaining about when you were a child, but you now understand?
What is something you do that 'has no point', but you do so anyway because it brings you joy?
How are you different when you are going through a rough vs. good season in life?
What do you want to bring into November, and what do you want to leave behind in October?
November: What would you like to get done before 2025 ends?
What is your favourite and least favourite part of a typical day in your life?
What does the best version of yourself look like? What is something you can do today to be one step closer to that version?
When online shopping, what immediately turns you off from ordering on a website?
What is something that you are proud of, but no one really witnessed it or knows about it?
What is something you would love to have every colour of? What is a default colour that you tend to always buy things in, apart from black or white?
Think of someone who is dear to you. If you both suddenly had your memories wiped, do you think you would eventually become close again?
How would your life be different if you weren’t into journals, planners, or stationery?
When do you feel the most drained?
You come home after a long day and a friend/family texts you with some news. What news would be the best news ever?
What is something you haven’t been honest with yourself about?
If you could have a lifetime supply of 3 things under £3, what would you pick?
What makes you feel enthused and energised?
What is something you dislike doing, even though it’s pretty easy and doesn’t take too much time?
How would you respond to someone asking what the point of your hobby is?
What have you been daydreaming about lately?
What do you like being complimented on? What is a compliment you don’t like to receive?
What is something you feel like you wasted your time or money on?
Imagine you just moved to your city. You have no family & friends here, and you are single. How would you make friends?
You can pick a red, yellow, green, and brown food item to live off for the next 2 weeks. Which four food items would you pick?
What is something negative that stopped happening?
What is your favourite outfit lately? Feel free to doodle or describe it!
What can you do today to be a smidgen better of a person than yesterday?
What is the most difficult part about being in love?
What has been on your mind lately?
What is a 'boring' item you would unironically like to receive as a present?
What is a gender role or stereotype you really don’t like?
What makes you a fan of a person, group or brand?
How much time did you spend in nature this week? Is time in nature important to you?
What do you want to bring into December, and what do you want to leave behind in November?
December: What will you leave behind from this year4? What will you bring into the next year? (e.g. a habit)
Think of something you collect. What is a version of it that you wish to find, or you wish existed? (e.g. I wish I could find my perfect yellow fountain pen ink)
What is a food you like that many people don’t like?
Think of a personality flaw you have. Why do you think you have that flaw?
If you could have a 5 storey building all to yourself, what would each storey be for?
Do you think it is possible to have a truly perfect day, with no negative emotions and no negative events?
What is something you love about your country?
What is a bandwagon you jumped on?
Suppose someone is describing you to a sketch artist for a wanted poster. What traits would they say to make the sketch identifiable as you?
Can you admit a time you have likely caused a customer service person grief?
What is something you wish people cared more about?
What is the best vehicle for ice cream: cone, cup, or popsicle? The other two will no longer be offered in this world.
What do you miss and don’t miss about high school?
What is an out of character thing you have done?
What is a recurring problem in your life?
There is a line of 100 people. If you beat them all one-by-one at one thing, you get a big fat cheque. What challenge would you choose?
What makes you instantly turned off about someone?
How do you typically respond to a threat? (fight, flight, freeze, flop, friend)
Suppose you were not related to your family, and they are all around the same age as you. Do you think you would get along as friends?
Does how you feel about your appearance affect how you act during the day?
Suppose you could make your own pizza with unlimited free toppings. What would you pick to maximize the value, while not compromising on taste and integrity of the pizza?
From your view, what is the biggest global event that happened in your lifetime? Thoughts?
What is an admirable trait you see in others, that you wish you had yourself?
Have you ever felt crazy for disagreeing with the majority opinion?
What do you think about marriage?
What is a food you will always overeat, no matter what?
What is something you have always wanted to do? What would be the first step in making that happen?
Think of a movie, TV show, or book that you consume over and over again. What do you like about it?
If you could have the full range of something, what would you choose? (e.g. all 108 tombow dual brush pen colours)
Suppose you had not used a planner or journal this year. How do you think your life would be different?
What are you going to do differently tomorrow?
